text: "Brighter Than the Sun" is a 2011 song by Colbie Caillat and is the second single from her third studio album All of You. It went to number 47 in the United States, number 65 in Canada, number 55 in Switzerland, number 31 in Austria, number 67 in South Korea and number 77 in Japan. ==References== Category:2011 songs Category:Folk-pop songs Category:Colbie Caillat songs
title: Brighter Than the Sun
